name: HSC_FINDINGS
description: This table contains data about the lesions from which a specimen was obtained during an imaging biopsy procedure.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LESION_FINDING_ID
columns.description: Stores IDs of the patient's findings (RES records).
